text: Ndipo musaphe wina aliyense amene Mulungu waletsa pokhapokha ngati pali chifukwa chololedwa. Ndipo aliyense amene waphedwa mopanda chilungamo, Ife tamupatsa m’bale wake mphamvu zobwezera kapena kukhululuka pa imfa yake. Koma m’bale wakeyo asapyole muyeso pa kubwezeraku. Ndithudi iye ndi wotetezedwa
